text: Kevin Feige ( ; born June 2, 1973) is an American movie producer and television producer. He became president of Marvel Studios in 2007. He is known for producing and creating many of the Marvel Cinematic Universe movies and television shows. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American television producers Category:Movie producers from Massachusetts Category:Disney people Category:Businesspeople from Boston
title: Kevin Feige
